page.title: 15WEST WIGHT MIDDLE SCHOOL
page.content:
WEST WIGHT MIDDLE
My teacher would call out a register. A register is a book with names of pupils in the class. After that we will have to line up for asembley. An assembley is a place where we sing and say prayers. Then we would go back to our classrooms for lessons. Then a bell would go and we would go out to play. In a playground or field. Then we would hear the bell and line up outside the classroom. Sometimes we would go to another room for science, C.D.T. library and music. After our lessons another bell would go and we would have lunch. We either have snacks, dinners, sandwiches or go home for dinner. To get snacks or dinners we would have to have a ticket or card. Then more lessons until the bell went.
